li.text: Uploaded base file.
Wrote desciption modified about file made FAQ section

Improved description more improved FAQ Made Public Altered Xenotypes expanded and More to fit this better (description, FAQ, and requirments) made it use Super Hero Genes: Base added incompatibilities

Improved about files added a note about placeholder icons (I put it on the steam description well before this update, so it's more like "V 1.0.2-b" Added my first custom gene-set ("Bio-Stability") Added some more to steam description Updated FAQ Removed the Super Hero Genes requirement (apparently, the mod "Expanded Biotech Style Genes Framework" has the same features, (Well, on a technicallity they have minute differences, but nothing of gameplay import)

Added "Endling" gene for the Endling: Last of their kind mod
Started work on Wiki Mentioned Wiki on About File Made sure link worked Add "feature summary" discussion to steam Add link to said summary in steam Completely re-designed discussion Made a document to store ideas for improvments to the steam discussions
Decreased size of some icons that where the wrong size Put all those into "Base Icons" Moved "Endling" into it's own "base icon" folder. Not sure if it's a benificial change, might be changed one day

Found out I forgot to update the version number. Well, changeing it is a new version, so... it's fixed in 1.1.2 Added a ".branch log" folder so I can keep track of changes done in seperate beta branches, without messing with the changelog added in folders that will be needed in the future, to allow easier mergeing made description also mention the steam changelog added in a debug category for me to easily access genes I'm working on. Hopefully that helps development some Fixed author to include the The Dynamic Trio Removed the entire EBSG series as a requirment, as I'm not using those genes as much as I thought. THey are still going to be the most integrated of mods, so... definitly a 100% recommendation! Altered FAQ and Description to match requirment changes Added a discussion that is just a list of optional dependencies Modified the other mod to require the EBSG series Integrated with Visual Studio for easier coding and updates Made a note of Vanilla Expanded
Last "major" update for 1.4 (most likley) Added in the folder for 1.5 (albiet with nothing but a text file) Transfered in the xenos from my other mod, mergeing the two into one!

Updated to 1.5 (not compatible with 1.4) Changed ID's of features (hence the 1.4 incompatibilities) Changed ID fixed name issues changed description, as the goal for this mod has been refined removed Royalty as a hard compat, as really Biotech is the only DLC I'm using as a "core" component, the rest should be able to be made as either A) Soft compat B) In extreme cases, addon mod fixed an indent (format issue) Removed un-used placeholder folders from 1.4

updated about file added Pathfinding Framework as requirment added ebsg slayer gens as incompat fixed some requirments added in a few missing load order indices made What's that Mod always load lower than this mod improved load order so all the "commented out" ones are one comment, as they are commented out for the same reason. Now I can collapse them all at once if desired!

added compat with Rimworld of Magic, by (with permission) integrating Rimworld of Magic Genes, and Rimworld of Magic Class Genes. Completley optional dependency
P.S. due to a person commenting about issues with 1.4, I was inspired to put this into the 1.4 area as well, so technically another 1.4 update
continued on new description (hopefully it will be done before the next update added in tabula Rasa based changelog

With the authors permission, the mod Gender Ratio Genes (which I ported a while ago, and is linked in this changenote), has been integrated in the ID's where kept the same, so they are also marked as incompatible.
I also modified the about file to mention the author of Gender Ratio Genes as an author, and edited it some more
removed pathfinding framework as a requirment as it's causeing errors, and isn't needed fixed an error in the changelog that was causeing errors
There is a feature i'm working on, and I am not sure if it got merged. It wasn't the finished one, so... well, who knows, you might get a surprise feature
Finally updated the steam workshop page Along with that, updated the FAQ page
Integrated in code based off of GetDonkOn's mod "VPE psycastfocus cost genes", implementing them in my mod (it requires vanilla psycasts expanded)
Fixed some "minor" issues that prevented the genes from working at all, by altering the path in the load folder
Fixed a minor-ish issue in the previous changelog entry (I forgot to put the source link in)
decreased extraneus and outdated files
